p: The initial values of L* (lightless), a* (redness) and b* (yellowness) were 34.29–40.39, 7.69–10.98 and 13.09–15.94, respectively ( Table 2). These values were similar to those obtained at the beginning of the experiment. The positive control sample showed higher values of L* and b*, and the lowest of a*, although significant differences were not found compared with the other treatments ( p > 0.05).
